name: MCT_Gather
title: MCT $gather operation
description: This operation gathers data from all sites (facilities) configured for the given provider for the given measure and measurement period. A MeasureReport is returned that will have evaluatedResources that reference the resource data that was gathered. Additionally, the MeasureReport will have contained OperationOutcome resources that provide any messages that are the result of validating the data gathered.

parameter.name: patients
parameter.documentation: The patients for which the data is gathered. Defined in the `Group.member.entity` element.

parameter.name: facilities
parameter.documentation: The facilities that are gathering the data defined as references to [Location](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/location.html) resource ids.

parameter.name: measure
parameter.documentation: The [Measure](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/measure.html) resource reference (id or url) used to determine the data requirements

parameter.name: period
parameter.documentation: The measurement period. This should be defined as a fiscal quarter (3 month increments).

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: This operation returns a single [Parameters](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/parameters.html) resource with either MeasureReport resources or an OperationOutcome if a runtime error is encountered. The [MeasureReport](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/measurereport.html) for each facility is returned in a `Parameters.parameter` element where the Location id is the `Parameters.parameter.name`.
